dct_title_s: Canaan commonly called the Holy Land or the Land of Promise being ye. possession of ye. Israelites & travelled through by our Lord & Saviour Jesus Christ and his Apostles
dct_description_sm: engraven by Richard Palmer for Richard Blome.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "English Miles."
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, land and sea travel routes, settlements, places of historical interest.
Includes legend: The meaning of these marks.
Decorative cartouches with angels and ships.
Shows the Holy Land oriented with north toward the right. Shows land divided into Calilee, Samaria, and Judea.
